Why Drive with ChillNOW?

Join thousands of drivers who have found success with our platform. We provide everything you need to thrive in the cannabis delivery space.

Competitive Pay

Earn $25-35 per hour with tips and bonuses. Get paid weekly with instant cash out options.

Flexible Schedule

Work when you want. Set your own hours and take time off whenever you need it.

Safe & Secure

All deliveries are tracked and monitored. We provide insurance coverage for all drivers.

Supportive Community

Join a network of professional drivers with 24/7 support and driver resources.

Local Deliveries

Stay in your area with deliveries typically within 5-10 miles of your location.

Easy App

Simple driver app with real-time navigation, order tracking, and earnings dashboard.

Vehicle Support

Get help with vehicle maintenance, fuel discounts, and vehicle financing options.

Growth Opportunities

Advance to lead driver, trainer, or operations roles as we expand to new markets.

Driver Requirements

To ensure the safety and quality of our service, all drivers must meet these requirements.

Age Requirement

Must be 21 years or older

Legal age requirement for cannabis delivery in all markets

Valid Driver's License

Clean driving record required

No major violations in the past 3 years

Background Check

Pass comprehensive background screening

Criminal background check and drug screening required

Reliable Vehicle

Car, SUV, truck, or motorcycle

Vehicle must be insured and in good working condition

Smartphone

iPhone or Android with data plan

Required for our driver app and GPS navigation

Insurance Coverage

Valid auto insurance policy

Minimum liability coverage as required by state law

Ready to Get Started?

If you meet all the requirements above, you're ready to apply! The application process takes about 10 minutes and includes a quick background check.

How It Works

Getting started as a ChillNOW driver is simple. Follow these 5 easy steps to begin earning.

STEP 01

Apply Online

Fill out our simple application form with your basic information and vehicle details.

Takes about 10 minutes to complete

01
STEP 02

Background Check

We'll run a quick background check and verify your driving record and insurance.

Usually completed within 24-48 hours

02
STEP 03

Get Approved

Once approved, you'll receive your driver credentials and access to our driver app.

Welcome to the ChillNOW driver family!

03
STEP 04

Start Driving

Download the app, set your availability, and start accepting delivery requests.

Begin earning immediately

04
STEP 05

Get Paid

Earn money for every delivery with weekly payouts and instant cash out options.

Track your earnings in real-time

05
